column5: Just getting an idea, is anyone going to be bringing spinning reels for sale? I'm looking to get a decent one to pair with a new UL rod I picked up and would rather give the money to one of you guys over BPS.  I'm going to have some reels there Jeremy  I'll have a list of things I'll be bringing posted also
Hey everyone  One week away from the event  I just wanted to get a feel for how many people are still planing on coming out.  I'll be reserving a table later in the week
Unfortunately i cannot make it. Have a baptism to attend to. Would of loved to come and meet a few ofc members.
Looks like I'm working the 11th, sorry guys, would have been fun.
I'll be there.
Im in
Here's some gear (so far) I'll be bringing. Hope to add more this week.               The Okuma is missing its screw cap.
Nice lot of gear you have there already Simon  I'll try and get some pictures up also at the least I'll have a list of items
Sorry... Something came up at work.....I'm working all weekend...
I just reserved a table for 2:30
Bump to remind

For any members that will be attending today  I'll be there in a Black Ford F-150 with a cap on the bed  Here are a few items I'll be bringing, sorry no pictures  The reservation is for a table of 10 but is in the bar area so if more come we can mingle if more then expected come out  Looking forward to seeing and meeting all that can attend today
Hey pike slayer, how much for the double 8?
Sold
How much for that fish hawk?
How did it go today? Hopefully a decent turn out and a lot of fun.
You had to be there. What happens at a GTG stays at a GTG...

Hello fellow OFC members  Iâ€™m coming to you with an idea that Pikeslayer and myself came up with. With the nicer weather finally here we want to organize a GTA west end get together. We want to do something simple like wings and drinks, followed by a swap meet or swap meet followed by wings and drinks.  We are planning on doing it on Saturday April 11 . We picked this date because both Simon and I are sure most of us are going to be hitting the creek and river beds later in April.  We want to have it close to one of the major highways that is why I picked the following location  The Live Bait Ale House http://www.livebaitalehouse.com/  1185 Maple Ave, Milton, ON L9T 0A5 It is located just minutes away from James Snow Parkway and the 401  Swap: 1:00pm  Food: 2:30pm  Cheers  (updated April 08)
We used to get together quite a bit years ago but it just seemed to fade away. Hope you get it off the ground and have a great time.
Use to get together at the Fire Hall in Bronte
I'm in as long as I don't have to work that day.
I'd be interested for sure!
I'd like to make it.
I would also try to make it if I can!
Sounds interesting. I guess it depends on how far west you are coming out.

I would suggest that you not pick a location by committee, but simply pick one. Dictate the time, the place and format, and everyone who is interested will fall into line. I'm at the head of that line BTW. Great idea!
Would love to get out but will be busy getting things ready for the odyssey two weeks later.

I would suggest that you not pick a location by committee, but simply pick one. Dictate the time, the place and format, and everyone who is interested will fall into line. I'm at the head of that line BTW. Great idea!  I like that ok I'm going to pick a spot.  EDITED: Original post edited as well, I selected The Live Bait Ale House located at 1185 Maple Ave, Milton, ON L9T 0A5. This is just minutes from James Snow Parkway and the 401.  Here is a link to their website http://www.livebaitalehouse.com/, I've been before, and the food and service was great not to mention the 90+ types of beer they have
I should be able to attend.
DB, Is there sufficient parking area for a tailgate tackle swap?? I got a lot of gear @ garage sale pricing I'd like to see repurposed.

Sage advice Albert and see that DB has followed. DB, Is there sufficient parking area for a tailgate tackle swap?? I got a lot of gear @ garage sale pricing I'd like to see repurposed.  Yes there is Plenty of parking
Yes there is Plenty of parking  Google earth is a wonderful thing. The wry pronouncement of Plenty of Parking made me laugh.
What time?  1pm?
What time?  1pm?  Sure I was thinking that anyways
I was just throwing it out there.  I did not want to step on your toe's Brian.

I was just throwing it out there.  I did not want to step on your toe's Brian.  Well great minds think alike then Colin,  and don't worry you weren't stepping on my toes, since this is my first time spear heading such a event.  Thanks for the input and looking forward to seeing you again
I'll get some photos of my gear for sale items up this weekend.
If I can come I'll have a couple fly reels, a fly combo, some flies, and I'll see what tackle I can scratch together.
Sorry guys.  Warden says i have a prior commitment.
I'll try to make it.   Work is crazy right now.

Just getting an idea, is anyone going to be bringing spinning reels for sale? I'm looking to get a decent one to pair with a new UL rod I picked up and would rather give the money to one of you guys over BPS.
